scripts.docker:stop: docker stop pelak-app || true && docker rm pelak-app || true
scripts.docker:clean: docker stop pelak-app || true && docker rm pelak-app || true && docker image prune -f
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run && echo 'Container started on http://localhost:3000'
scripts.docker:test:compose: npm run docker:build && docker-compose up -d && echo 'Container started on http://localhost:3000'
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.version:set: npm version && git push && git push --tags
